org.eclipse.scada.configuration.component

Interface System

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemImpl

    public interface System
    A representation of the model object 'System'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Levels
    • Configurations
    • Services
    • Infrastructure
    • Default Customization Pipeline
    • Default Archive Selector

    See Also:
    ComponentPackage.getSystem()
